scripts.build: wget https://github.com/openseadragon/openseadragon/releases/download/v2.4.1/openseadragon-bin-2.4.1.tar.gz && tar -zxvf openseadragon-bin-2.4.1.tar.gz && rsync -a openseadragon-bin-2.4.1 public/openseadragon && rm openseadragon-bin-2.4.1.tar.gz && rm -r openseadragon-bin-2.4.1 && vue-cli-service build && rm -rf ../web/static && rsync -a dist/static/* ../web/static && cp dist/index.html ../web/classifier/templates && cp public/openseadragon/openseadragon-bin-2.4.1/*.js ../web/static/js && cp -r public/openseadragon/openseadragon-bin-2.4.1/images/* ../web/media/
